features: Universal Compatibility: Our baby bottle handles are designed to fit a wide range of baby bottles and sippy cups, ensuring convenience and versatility for parents. Compatible with bottles and cups measuring 2 1/4 inches in diameter, these handles provide a hassle-free solution.

Effortless Handling: Our bottle handles feature dual easy-grip handles that promote independent feeding in a more efficient manner. With their smooth, longer, and ergonomically designed shape, these handles offer a natural and comfortable grip for both babies and parents.

Stress-Free Feeding: Never worry about transferring bottle handles from one bottle to another again. Our pack includes five vibrant colors (red, green, blue, pink and yellow), ensuring you always have a handle on hand. Installing, cleaning, and storing these silicone bottle holders is a breeze, making bottle feeding a hands-free and stress-free experience.

Safe and Teething-Friendly: Crafted from food-safe BPA-free silicone, our bottle holders prioritize your baby's health and safety. They contain no chemical additives and are especially suitable for teething babies. Rest easy knowing that your little one is using a product that is free from harmful substances.

Easy Maintenance: Our bottle handles are dishwasher-safe, thanks to their smooth and non-porous silicone material. Cleaning and disinfecting them is a breeze, ensuring maximum hygiene for your baby's feeding accessories. Additionally, these handles are durable and can withstand heat, allowing for immediate use after being removed from the dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are really good they fit evenflo, lansinoh and avent wide neck , glass bottles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Super stretchy and can get on Tommee Tippee bottle with enough convincing. Got it on a water bottle too. They seem well made and durable. Will fit on most bottles. Baby seems to like them and took to them well. Anything under 2.5-3” diameter it will fit for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It fits the dr browns bottles and avent anti colic bottles. my 5 month old was able to hold it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit standard bottles well
reviews.reviewText: Gos on and off easy enough on a standard bottle, but I couldn't get it on a fatter bottle... I love them
